chunked_vad.lyrics_text: You are my glass half empty Sipping my ocean dry Emotionally spin me 'Till none of our planets could align
Sipping my ocean dry Emotionally spin me 'Till none of our planets could align But I could stand you one more night
Emotionally spin me 'Till none of our planets could align But I could stand you one more night You are a catch-22, either way I miss out
'Till none of our planets could align But I could stand you one more night You are a catch-22, either way I miss out All of the grief I give you
But I could stand you one more night You are a catch-22, either way I miss out All of the grief I give you Is energy I can live without
You are a catch-22, either way I miss out All of the grief I give you Is energy I can live without But I could stand you one more night
All of the grief I give you Is energy I can live without But I could stand you one more night I like us better when we're wasted
Is energy I can live without But I could stand you one more night I like us better when we're wasted It makes it easier to fake it
But I could stand you one more night I like us better when we're wasted It makes it easier to fake it The only time we really talk
I like us better when we're wasted It makes it easier to fake it The only time we really talk Is when our clothes are coming off
It makes it easier to fake it The only time we really talk Is when our clothes are coming off I like us better when we're wasted
The only time we really talk Is when our clothes are coming off I like us better when we're wasted I like us better when we're wasted
Is when our clothes are coming off I like us better when we're wasted I like us better when we're wasted It makes it easier to say it
I like us better when we're wasted I like us better when we're wasted It makes it easier to say it Lay all your laundry on the bed
I like us better when we're wasted It makes it easier to say it Lay all your laundry on the bed And then I'll lay in it instead
It makes it easier to say it Lay all your laundry on the bed And then I'll lay in it instead I like us better when we're wasted
